metadata.title: RA Family: What is included in the kit and any other components to prepare in addition?

sections.content:
Question:
What is included in the kit and any other components to prepare in addition?
Answer:
This kit is an complete solution with accessories included to jumpstart development for VUI applications.
Request for free access o cloud-based development tools DSpotter or DSpotterNLU from Renesas Ready ecosystem partner, Cyberon and you are complete to start the evaluation. Please check our web landing page for detail.
RA8M1 Voice User Reference Kit (VK-RA8M1): https://www.renesas.com/us/en/products/microcontrollers-microprocessors/ra-cortex-m-mcus/vk-ra8m1-ra8m1-voice-user-reference-kit
RA6E1 Voice User Reference Kit (TW001-VUIA6E1POCZ): https://www.renesas.com/us/en/products/microcontrollers-microprocessors/ra-cortex-m-mcus/tw001-vuia6e1pocz-ra6e1-voice-user-reference-kit
RA4E1 Voice User Reference Kit (TW001-VUIA4E1POCZ): https://www.renesas.com/us/en/products/microcontrollers-microprocessors/ra-cortex-m-mcus/tw001-vuia4e1pocz-ra4e1-voice-user-reference-kit
RA2L1 Voice User Reference Kit (TW001-VUIA2L1POCZ): https://www.renesas.com/us/en/products/microcontrollers-microprocessors/ra-cortex-m-mcus/tw001-vuia2l1pocz-ra2l1-voice-user-reference-kit
Suitable Products
RA8M1
